title: (x) "Charme" script from La Perla perfume bottle - Annabelle {Alejandro Paul}
content:
Hi,

This is a script from la Perla’s “Charme” fragrance. Please help identify if you can…

Thanks\Eleanor

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [charme\_laperla.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070329120801/http:/typophile.com/files/charme_laperla.jpg) | 117.21 KB |
author: eleanorrogers

comments.content: Probably hand calligraphy. Have a look at [Bickham Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20070329120801/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=ADT0005366).
